result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘ACDH-ÖAW Services for Digital Humanities’) length (= 40) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘Various services provided by the Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities of the Austrian Academy of Sciences (ACDH-ÖAW) (primarily in the context of the CLARIN initiative).’) length (= 171) < 20 or > 100.
result.requirement: Partially a requirement for DFN-AAI registration. Partially a requirement for the GÉANT Data Protection Code of Conduct Entity Category. Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation.
